text.name: gui_fn_StartDayHourToolTip
text.text: Select the start hour for the day mode

text.name: gui_fn_StartDayMinuteToolTip
text.text: Select the start minute for the day mode

text.name: gui_fn_DayTimeScaleToolTip
text.text: Select the time scaling for the day mode

text.name: gui_fn_AutoDayTimeScaleToolTip
text.text: enables / disables automatic day time scaling

text.name: gui_fn_StartNightHourToolTip
text.text: Select the start hour for night mode

text.name: gui_fn_StartNightMinuteToolTip
text.text: Select the start minute for night mode

text.name: gui_fn_NightTimeScaleToolTip
text.text: Select the time scaling for night mode

text.name: gui_fn_AutoNightTimeScaleToolTip
text.text: enables / disables automatic night time scaling

text.name: gui_fn_ShowHelpToolTip
text.text: Show Fastnight key assignment in F1 help window
